  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map(SimulationOptions simulationOptions)
      Construct a new map. Generate the world height map using Perlin noise generator, place villages, humans and creatures on the map.
      Parameters:
      simulationOptions - Simulation options provided by the user

  • Method Details

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Biome at the given position

    • getRandomPosition

      public Position getRandomPosition(List<BiomeConverter.Biome> allowedBiomes)
      Get a random position within specified biome constraints
      Parameters:
      allowedBiomes - List of biomes where the new position is allowed to be
      Returns:
      Position object

    • simulationTick

      public void simulationTick()
      Perform a single simulation tick for all villages and creatures. Check if all villages belong to one team. If so, mark the simulation as complete.

    • getHeightMap

      public HeightMap getHeightMap()
      Get the world height map

    • killCreature

      public void killCreature(Creature creature)
      Kill the given creature. Remove it from the list and create a new one of exactly the same type.
      Parameters:
      creature - Creature to be killed

    • getNearestEnemyWithinDistance

      public Creature getNearestEnemyWithinDistance(Human requester, int distance)
      Get the nearest enemy creature within the specified distance. Note that all non-human creatures are treated as enemies in this context.
      Parameters:
      requester - Human whose enemies are to be taken into account
      distance - Maximum distance between the given human and creature
      Returns:
      The nearest enemy creature or null if there is none within specified distance.

    • collectResource

      public Inventory.ItemType collectResource(Human requester)
      Get a random item based on biome where the given human is
      Parameters:
      requester - Human whose position is to be taken into account
      Returns:
      Resource item type or null if the human did not have enough luck
